titles.title: Grand Jury Procedural Protection Act of 1987

A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for dismissal of a criminal case, before or after judgement, upon a finding of error in the grand jury proceedings from which the indictment arose.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Grand Jury Procedural Protection Act of 1987 - Amends the Federal criminal code to provide for the dismissal of a criminal indictment by a court upon a finding of substantial error in the grand jury proceedings.
